statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT maintenance_type, next_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
SELECT last_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type='Oil Change';
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 4;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 123 ORDER BY next_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule GROUP BY maintenance_type;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2022-06-01' AND next_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance;
SELECT mechanic_name, mechanic_specialization FROM mechanic;
SELECT mechanic_name FROM mechanic WHERE mechanic_specialization = 'Electrical';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, mechanic_name FROM vehicle_maintenance JOIN mechanic ON vehicle_maintenance.mechanic_id = mechanic.mechanic_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%oil%';
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT brand, model FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT vehicle_id, brand, model, year FROM Vehicle ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT log_id, description FROM MaintenanceLog;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE brand = 'Toyota';
SELECT DISTINCT brand FROM Vehicle;
SELECT vehicle_id, brand, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY year DESC;

SELECT MaintenanceLog.log_id, MaintenanceLog.maintenance_date, MaintenanceSchedule.maintenance_type, Vehicle.brand FROM MaintenanceLog INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ON MaintenanceLog.schedule_id = MaintenanceSchedule.schedule_id INNER JOIN Vehicle ON MaintenanceSchedule.vehicle_id = Vehicle.vehicle_id ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM vehicles WHERE year_of_manufacture = 2020;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, year_of_manufacture FROM vehicles ORDER BY year_of_manufacture ASC;
SELECT maintenance_task, scheduled_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, year_of_manufacture FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_make LIKE 'Toy%' ORDER BY year_of_manufacture DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 1 ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, year_of_manufacture FROM vehicles WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2018;
SELECT m.task_name, m.task_description, v.vehicle_make FROM maintenance_tasks m JOIN vehicles v ON m.task_id = v.vehicle_id;
SELECT MAX(estimated_duration) AS max_duration, MIN(estimated_duration) AS min_duration FROM maintenance_tasks;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(DISTINCT maintenance_task) AS total_tasks FROM maintenance_logs GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING total_tasks > 5;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, year FROM vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT mechanic_id, name FROM mechanic ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT record_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT log_id, work_description FROM maintenance_log WHERE mechanic_id = 123 ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT make, model FROM vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota' ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT m.name, mr.maintenance_type, ml.work_description FROM mechanic m JOIN maintenance_log ml ON m.mechanic_id = ml.mechanic_id JOIN maintenance_records mr ON ml.record_id = mr.record_id;
SELECT v.make, ms.maintenance_type FROM vehicle v JOIN maintenance_schedule ms ON v.vehicle_id = ms.vehicle_id WHERE ms.scheduled_date < '2023-01-01';
